distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for slurm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-19728: Fixed a privilege escalation with srun (bsc#1159692).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: SchedMD Slurm before 18.08.9 and 19.x before 19.05.5 executes srun --uid with incorrect privileges.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
